languages.text: {n}Уралон Жестокий вновь отрывается от книги.{/n} "Чемпион. Зачем на этот раз тебя привела ко мне Истина?"
{n}Uralon the Cruel looks away from his tome once more.{/n} "Champion. What is the Truth's reason for this arrival?"
languages.original_text: {n}Уралон Жестокий вновь отрывается от книги.{/n} "Чемпион. Зачем на этот раз тебя привела ко мне Истина?"

languages.text: {n}Uralon le Cruel détourne à nouveau le regard de son livre.{/n} « {mf|Champion|Championne}. Quel bon vent de vérité vous amène ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon the Cruel looks away from his tome once more.{/n} "Champion. What is the Truth's reason for this arrival?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Uralon le Cruel détourne à nouveau le regard de son livre.{/n} « {mf|Champion|Championne}. Quel bon vent de vérité vous amène ? »

languages.text: {n}Uralon el Cruel vuelve a apartar la mirada de su libro.{/n} «Campe{mf|ón|ona}. ¿Qué motivo tiene la Verdad para traerte hasta mí?».
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon the Cruel looks away from his tome once more.{/n} "Champion. What is the Truth's reason for this arrival?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Uralon el Cruel vuelve a apartar la mirada de su libro.{/n} «Campe{mf|ón|ona}. ¿Qué motivo tiene la Verdad para traerte hasta mí?».

languages.text: {n}残酷なウラロンはもう一度書物から視線を外す。{/n}「英雄よ。ここに来た真の理由は何だ？」
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon the Cruel looks away from his tome once more.{/n} "Champion. What is the Truth's reason for this arrival?"

traits.locale_text: {n}残酷なウラロンはもう一度書物から視線を外す。{/n}「英雄よ。ここに来た真の理由は何だ？」

languages.text: {n}残暴者乌拉隆再次将目光从手上的大部头著作中移开。{/n}“真理为何将你指引至此，勇士？”
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon the Cruel looks away from his tome once more.{/n} "Champion. What is the Truth's reason for this arrival?"

traits.locale_text: {n}残暴者乌拉隆再次将目光从手上的大部头著作中移开。{/n}“真理为何将你指引至此，勇士？”

languages.text: {n}Uralon der Grausame wendet sich erneut von seinem Buch ab.{/n} "Champion. Was ist der Wahrheit Grund für Euer Kommen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon the Cruel looks away from his tome once more.{/n} "Champion. What is the Truth's reason for this arrival?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Uralon der Grausame wendet sich erneut von seinem Buch ab.{/n} "Champion. Was ist der Wahrheit Grund für Euer Kommen?"

languages.text: {n}Zalim Uralon, başını bir kez daha kitabından kaldırıyor.{/n} "Müdafi. Hakikat'in seni buraya getirmekteki sebebi nedir?"
languages.original_text: {n}Uralon the Cruel looks away from his tome once more.{/n} "Champion. What is the Truth's reason for this arrival?"
